alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ransom, southwestern Richland and Sargent Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near La Moure to near Straubville to near Langford. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lisbon, Gwinner, Milnor, Forman, Rutland, Cogswell and Havana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
